FuncDef: This command uses the boot option parameters currently in memory and writes them from the boot option file to the specified compact flash.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the compact flash ID where the bof.cfg is to be saved. Values-cf1:, cf1-A:, cf1-B:, cf2:, cf2-A:, cf2-B:, cf3:, cf3-A:, cf3-B:. ParamDefault: Default- cf3:

ExtraInfo: Default: Saves must be explicitly executed. The BOF is saved to cf3: if a location is not specified.
